13.title: A female serving 1 Goddess of Size

131.content:
Samantha was a beautiful girl with long blonde hair and perfect blue eyes. She was once slim but she has grown curvy as of late for she is a priestess who resides at the shrine of Gluttonia, a goddess of size. Gluttonia is a morbidly obese woman with immense breasts atop a massive belly. Gluttonia has very long silver hair and an affinity for gaining weight or watching girls gain weight. Gluttonia requires offerings such as food or watching a woman, usually Samantha, dance or just eat alot.

Samantha earned her position through a set of trials all of them huge meals. She started off as a skinny girl and because of her beauty she was eligible for the title. Along with other potential priestess', Samantha had to undergo intense feeding sessions to show how much fat their bodies would retain. Eating high fats all day, being sedentary, and studying the significance of fat became the girls daily schedule. As each girl dejectedly dropped out, the remainders grew fatter. Eventually, the beautiful Samantha was all that remained. Samantha's coronation ceremony was magnificent, a huge feast was laid out for all the women who ate for Gluttonia's pleasure.

Samantha performs many rituals throughout the year, from showing off her beautiful fat through dances, to eating specially prepared cakes baked on holy days, to entertaining Gluttonia in person. One ritual though is the yearly virgin fattening, were a thin virgin girl is fed by the priestess until she is obese. Gluttonia revels in young girls transforming from a thin into a fat figure.

Currently Samantha is...
131.title: Samantha

1311.content:
It was that time of year again, were Samantha performs the sacred act of feeding a slim virgin girl into obesity as an offering for the beautiful goddess Gluttonia. Massive amounts of food were prepared for the special event. A luxurious set of pillows and silks were donated to the shrine for the virgin's fattening ceremony. The virgin was a gorgeous 13 year old girl with long blonde hair, blue eyes, and an innocent smile. She was one of the skinniest girls in the village and had been deprived of nourishment in wait for the ceremony.

"Goddess Gluttonia, in honor of your ineffable beauty, a virgin shall be fed into obesity! Her frail figure shall be blessed with life sustaining fat. Calories will flow through her as your greatness flows through us. Fat shall grace her corporeality, amplifying the magnificence of her femininity." Samantha shouted out to the corpulent goddess of size.

The virgin walked up to the shrine were Samantha was waiting with piles of food. The virgin's long hair was washed and combed, her smooth skin was cleaned and perfumed, and she was ornamented with jewels and lavish robes. Samantha than showed the virgin's slim figure to the crowd before taking her inside the shrine. Samantha led the virgin to the fine silks and pillows. The virgin sat upon the comfortable pillows.

"Child of Gluttonia! In honor of Gluttonia's greatness, you shall undergo a beautiful transformation. Your thin body shall be laden with blessed fat and will become a symbol of femininity! Are you ready to please Gluttonia?" Samantha asked of the youth.

"Anything for Gluttonia." the tranquil virgin answered.

"Let us begin." Samantha said pulling up a large bowl of pudding.

Samantha commenced the fattening with a hearty helping of rich pudding. The virgin ate at Samantha's pace, unperturbed by the high calories. Retaining her elegance, the girl swallowed scoop after scoop of pudding until the bowl was empty. Samantha than swiftly grabbed more nourishment.
1311.title: fattening a virgin

info.brief_description: A tale of feeding, fattening, growth, and control.
info.description: Choose your path and watch as the growth unfolds. This is mainly a weight gain story (female weight gain only), with some giantess pieces. Girl on girl action is fine, but no guy on guy. The weight gain can be natural or unnatural but have some description to it and if it's a massive weight gain or massive growth, have it be a couple chapters. A Goddess of Size can change their form and any form of a person who is not a Goddess of Size.
